text: You cant use the dnd editor then. you must use the classic editor.

The form would still submit to HubSpot like always, but we’d inject an onSubmit to update the counter on the Airtable or spreadsheet.  We’ve done something like before. There are other things to consider, like security of the “counter” and such.  If you’d like to pursue this, it might be easier to discuss! Just send me a DM.
